text: He can’t comprehend self-sacrifice for the greater good. Only stopping at nothing, no matter the suffering and torrent of lies, to gorge on power and grandiosity. True sociopathy for all to see.
author: mbrence

text: Grief, compassion and ACTION to try to prevent more gun violence.
author: mbrence

text: Sunny is an awesome dog. Such a gift to our family.
author: mbrence

text: My son, then 10, and I were admiring a terrier mix at the Humane Society. “That’s my dog,” he told a lady nearby. I gently reminded him the dog already had “hold” and we were unlikely to get her. The lady had the hold. She went to the front desk and turned it over to us.
author: mbrence

text: No longer a journalist and yet here we are. Def wearing yellow and a confident smirk next time.
author: mbrence

text: Of all the challenges and suffering in the world, the president of the United States takes time to focus on a shrill, divisive, sycophantic TV host. It’s expected yet still utterly pathetic.
author: mbrence
